description: QA Testing and Dummy Data Population - Comprehensive testing of the bookkeeping application with realistic test data

userStories.title: Create test user accounts
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need multiple test accounts so that I can test the application from different user perspectives.
acceptanceCriteria: Create 5 user accounts: testuser1@example.com (Sarah Johnson), testuser2@example.com (Michael Chen), testuser3@example.com (Emily Rodriguez), testuser4@example.com (James Wilson), testuser5@example.com (Amanda Foster)
All accounts use password admin123
Each account is created via the registerUser action
Each account receives default categories on creation
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill - log in with testuser1@example.com
userStories.notes: Completed: Created seed script, 5 users created successfully, verified login in browser

userStories.title: Populate transactions for Sarah Johnson (freelancer)
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need realistic transaction data for a freelance designer with variable income.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 30-40 transactions for testuser1@example.com spanning last 6 months
Income: Freelance payments $500-5000 (variable, 2-4 per month)
Expenses: Rent $1500, Utilities $100-200, Food $200-500, Software subscriptions, Equipment
Realistic descriptions (e.g., 'Logo design for Acme Corp', 'Adobe Creative Cloud subscription')
Dates distributed across multiple months
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Completed: Created seed script, 59 transactions added (16 income, 43 expense) spanning 6 months. Typecheck passes.

userStories.title: Populate transactions for Michael Chen (salaried)
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need realistic transaction data for a salaried employee with stable income.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 25-35 transactions for testuser2@example.com spanning last 6 months
Income: Monthly salary $4500 on 1st of each month, occasional bonus
Expenses: Rent $1800, Utilities $150, Food $400-600, Transportation $200, Entertainment $100-300
Realistic descriptions (e.g., 'Monthly salary - January 2026', 'Grocery shopping at Trader Joes')
Consistent monthly pattern
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Populate transactions for Emily Rodriguez (business owner)
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need realistic transaction data for a small business owner.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 40-50 transactions for testuser3@example.com spanning last 6 months
Income: Consulting fees $2000-8000 (variable), product sales $500-2000
Expenses: Office rent $800, Supplies $100-500, Marketing $200-1000, Contractor payments
Realistic business descriptions (e.g., 'Consulting - Tech Corp Q1', 'Office supplies from Staples')
Mix of large and small transactions
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Populate transactions for James Wilson (part-time worker)
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need realistic transaction data for a part-time worker with lower income.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 20-30 transactions for testuser4@example.com spanning last 6 months
Income: Part-time wages $1200-1500 biweekly
Expenses: Rent $900, Food $200-300, Transportation $100, Entertainment $50-100
Expenses should sometimes exceed income (showing financial stress)
Realistic descriptions (e.g., 'Paycheck - Week of Jan 15', 'Bus pass monthly')
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create test invoices for Emily Rodriguez
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need invoice data to test invoice features.
acceptanceCriteria: Create 5 invoices for testuser3@example.com
Mix of statuses: 1 draft, 2 sent, 1 paid, 1 cancelled
Realistic client names and emails (e.g., 'Tech Innovations LLC', 'Global Solutions Inc')
Multiple line items per invoice (2-4 items)
Varied amounts ($500-$10000) and due dates
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill - view invoices list for testuser3

userStories.title: Smoke test authentication flows
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify basic auth flows work.
acceptanceCriteria: Login page loads correctly at /login
Can log in with testuser1@example.com / admin123
Redirects to dashboard after login
Logout redirects to login page
Protected route /transactions redirects to login when not authenticated
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Smoke test registration validation
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify registration validation works.
acceptanceCriteria: Registration page loads at /register
Registration fails with invalid email format (shows error)
Registration fails with password less than 8 characters (shows error)
Registration fails with mismatched passwords (shows error)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Functional test dashboard accuracy
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify the dashboard displays correct data.
acceptanceCriteria: Log in as testuser2@example.com (Michael Chen - stable income)
Dashboard loads and displays summary cards
Total Income shows correct sum for current month
Total Expenses shows correct sum for current month
Net Balance calculation is correct (Income - Expenses)
Recent transactions shows last 5 transactions
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Functional test transaction CRUD
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify transaction create, edit, delete work.
acceptanceCriteria: Log in as testuser5@example.com (Amanda - minimal data)
Can create new income transaction via Add Income button
Can create new expense transaction via Add Expense button
Can edit existing transaction (change description and amount)
Can delete transaction with confirmation dialog
List updates after each operation
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Functional test transaction filters and pagination
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify transaction filtering works.
acceptanceCriteria: Log in as testuser1@example.com (Sarah - many transactions)
Navigate to /transactions
Date range filter works (select last 30 days)
Category filter works (filter by Food category)
Quick filter buttons work (This Month, Last Month)
Pagination works if more than 20 transactions
Transaction totals update based on filters
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Functional test categories page
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify category management works.
acceptanceCriteria: Log in as testuser1@example.com
Navigate to /categories
Default categories displayed and marked as non-editable (buttons disabled)
Can create new custom expense category
Can edit custom category name
Cannot delete category that has transactions (error message shown)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Functional test reports page
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify reports display accurate data.
acceptanceCriteria: Log in as testuser1@example.com (has 6 months of data)
Navigate to /reports
Quick filters work (This Month, Last Month, YTD)
Income vs Expense bar chart displays correctly
Category breakdown pie chart displays correctly
Summary cards show correct totals for selected range
Can toggle between income/expense category breakdown
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Functional test invoice CRUD
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify invoice management works.
acceptanceCriteria: Log in as testuser3@example.com (Emily - has invoices)
Navigate to /invoices
Invoices list shows all 5 invoices with correct status badges
Can view invoice details by clicking row
Can edit draft invoice
Cannot edit sent/paid invoice (edit disabled)
Can mark sent invoice as paid
Can void/cancel an invoice
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Functional test CSV export
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify CSV export works.
acceptanceCriteria: Log in as testuser2@example.com
Navigate to /transactions
Apply a date filter (last 30 days)
Click Export CSV button
CSV file downloads with correct filename format
CSV contains filtered transactions only
Amounts formatted as dollars (not cents)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: E2E test new user onboarding
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify a complete new user journey.
acceptanceCriteria: Register new account: qatest@example.com with password admin123
Redirect to dashboard after registration
Dashboard shows $0 for all summary cards
Add first income transaction ($1000 salary)
Dashboard updates to show $1000 income
Add first expense transaction ($50 food)
Dashboard shows correct net balance ($950)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: E2E test invoice workflow
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify a complete invoice lifecycle.
acceptanceCriteria: Log in as testuser3@example.com
Create new invoice with client details and 3 line items
Verify total calculation is correct
Save as draft
Edit draft to add notes
Mark invoice as sent
Verify cannot edit sent invoice
Mark invoice as paid
Verify final status is paid
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Cross-viewport responsive testing
userStories.description: As a QA tester, I need to verify the application works at different viewport sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: Test at mobile viewport (375px width) - navigation usable, forms work
Test at tablet viewport (768px width) - layout adapts correctly
Test at desktop viewport (1280px width) - full layout displayed
Dashboard renders correctly at all sizes
Transactions table adapts or scrolls horizontally on mobile
Charts resize appropriately
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill with resize commands
